articles.title: Purpose of S. Korea's Delayed Opening to Public of Missile Test-fire Laid Bare
articles.content:
Purpose of S. Korea's Delayed Opening to Public of Missile Test-fire Laid Bare
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces conducted a ballistic missile test-fire in secrecy at the Anhung firing range in Thaean, South Chungchong Province on Mar. 23 and opened it to public more than ten days later.
					 South Korean media are loudly advertising that the puppet forces succeeded in the test-fire of a ballistic missile with a range of 500 km by applying foreign technology. They are openly claiming that if these ballistic missiles are deployed to be ready to go into action next year, they can put the whole area of the northern half of Korea except North Hamgyong Province within the striking range.
					
					 The spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army gave the following answer to a question put by newspaper Joson Inmingun on Saturday in this regard:
					
					 Great irony is that the puppet forces are claiming that they did a great job by conducting a test-fire of a ballistic missile with a range of just 500 km. And it cannot but be construed as a comedy that they opened to public the test-fire so late.
					
					 As already known, units of the Strategic Force of the KPA successfully conducted their regular rocket launching drills from late February to late March. At that time the south Korean puppet forces made much fuss together with the U.S., creating impression that the rockets launched by the KPA dropped in the heart of Seoul.
					
					 It was none other than the south Korean puppet forces which worked more desperately than any others in a bid to slap fresh "sanctions" against the DPRK while labeling the launching drills as a "violation of the UN resolutions" and a "provocation".
					
					 Ceaselessly heard from south Korea these days are voices chiding the puppet forces' poor military reaction to the regular artillery naval firing drills of the KPA.
					
					 To make matters worse, even drone cases occurred all of a sudden, more badly tarnishing the image of the puppet forces which had fallen to the ground.
					
					 Thrown into a pretty fix by the artillery naval firing drills in waters, a hotspot in the southwestern sector of the front, and the drone cases, the puppet authorities urgently required a way to put the situation under control.
					
					 They orchestrated a charade out of agony. It was to open to public in great haste the missile test-fire conducted in secrecy and advertise it as something great and "big success" in a bid to calm down the mounting accusation and derision.
					
					 With no rhetoric could they improve their poor position. This farce only brought disgrace to them.
					
					 People are anxious to know how the U.S. will approach the opening to public of the missile test-fire by the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 This is because what approach the U.S. will take towards the rocket launching drills conducted by the KPA and the south Korean puppet forces' missile test-fire, both of which happened on the Korean peninsula, would help judge again the American style standards and mode of action. 
					
					 Now the south Korean puppet forces will have no face to find fault with the DPRK over its justifiable rocket launches and its exercise of the right to self-defence any longer no matter how desperately they may wag their tongues.
					
					  The south Korean puppet forces should properly know that their position is becoming more pitiful as they are hell-bent on the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The U.S., too, would be well advised not to groundlessly take issue with the DPRK over its measures to bolster up its deterrence for self-defence.

articles.title: DPRK Asks Concerning Parties to Cooperate in Rescuing Crewmen of Sunken Cargo Ship
articles.content:
DPRK Asks Concerning Parties to Cooperate in Rescuing Crewmen of Sunken Cargo Ship 
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- There occurred an accident that the Mongolia-flagged trading cargo ship Grand Fortune 1 with crew of the Kunhae Shipping Company under the Maritime Administration of the DPRK aboard sank in the waters off Jeju Island at dawn on Friday while sailing to Shanghai, China.
					 The cause of the accident is under investigation.
					
					 Among 16 DPRK crewmen two were found dead and three were rescued with 11 others missing.
					
					 The DPRK hopes that the concerning parties will conduct rescue operations and help the survivors return to their families at an early date from the humanitarian point of view in accordance with the international usage.

articles.title: Heaven Day Ceremony of Chondoism Held
articles.content:
Heaven Day Ceremony of Chondoism Held
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Heaven Day Ceremony was held here on Saturday to mark the 154th founding anniversary of Chondoism.
					 Present there were Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Guidance Committee of the Chondoist Association of Korea, officials of the committee and Chondoists in Pyongyang.
					
					 Yun made a report at the ceremony.
					
					 He said that the Chondoists have devoted themselves to materializing the patriotic idea of "realizing Kwangje Changsaeng (deliverance of the people)", "promoting national interests and welfare of the people," "rejecting the West and Japan" and "building an earthly paradise" in the past period.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK has recently taken several measures, in particular, prompted by its noble desire to put an end to the territorial partition and national division and pave a wide avenue for improving the inter-Korean relations by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 However, the U.S. and other hostile forces have ignored the magnanimity and goodwill of the DPRK and resorted to vicious moves to undermine it politically, isolate it economically and stifle it militarily, rendering the situation of the country extremely tense, he noted.
					
					 He called upon all Chondoists in the north and the south to turn out as one in a nationwide struggle to reject outside forces, defend the security and peace of the nation, establish a climate for improving the inter-Korean relations and thus, open up a new phase for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The ceremony was held according to Chondoist rites.

articles.title: Art Troupes of Overseas Koreans Arrive
articles.content:
Art Troupes of Overseas Koreans Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Art troupes of overseas Koreans arrived here by air on Saturday to take part in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival. They were the art troupe of Koreans in China and a Korean woman soloist in Australia and her party.
					 Earlier, the art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans came here.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Anti-U.S. Struggle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Anti-U.S. Struggle
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent requirement for the movement of Korea's reunification at present times to smash the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It is necessary to direct the spearhead of the nation-wide struggle for reunification to the U.S. which is disturbing the national reconciliation and unity and bringing the danger of a war against the DPRK and to dynamically conduct intensified struggle against the U.S., says the article and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has desperately hamstrung the efforts of the Korean nation for reunification, persistently pursuing its policy of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the criminal aim sought by the U.S. to divide Korea into the north and the south forever and establish its domination over the DPRK and Northeast Asia with south Korea as a springboard.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about its "support" for the improvement of the north-south relations. But it is nothing but rhetoric to cover up its hostile policy of aggression toward the DPRK.
					
					 Whenever a dialogue opened between the north and the south and the spirit of reconciliation and reunification became strong, the U.S. ran the whole gamut of its desperate moves to spoil the dialogue and quell the spirit. It is also the U.S. which has created the constant danger of a war on the Korean peninsula while getting frenzy in its moves to provoke a fresh war.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the architect of the Korean division, chieftain against its reunification and the very one bringing nuclear holocaust to Koreans.
					
					 All Koreans should not tolerate any treacherous act of driving the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy of aggression toward the DPRK.
					
					 The victory of the cause of national reunification entirely depends on the efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The article calls on compatriots of various circles at home and abroad who love the country and the nation and aspire after the improvement of north-south relations and the country's reunification to turn out as one in the patriotic struggle to foil the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK and pave a wide avenue for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Moves for Abusing Inter-Korean Relations for Election Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves for Abusing Inter-Korean Relations for Election Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial titled "Drones appeared unexpectedly before election without commitments" on April 3.
					 It is not too much to say that the upcoming June 4 local election is the one without commitments, the editorial said.
					
					 There continues a death march such as the suicide committed by a mother and her two daughters in Songpha District, Seoul and the resentment of the people in distress is running high but political parties styling themselves mouthpieces of the people speak nothing about the people's life, it charged.
					
					 There is no commitment to democracy, either, it deplored.
					
					 The case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election, the fabrication of spy case, etc. are serous matters directly related to the impartiality of the election but they are not mentioned as core matters, it said, and went on: Contrary to it, the drone issue is appearing in the election all of a sudden.
					
					 Media are now linking with the north the letters on the unidentified drones which crashed on Paekryong Island and in Phaju, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 This reminds us of "No. 1" written on a torpedo propeller found at the time when Cheonan warship sinking case occurred in the run-up to the June 2 local election four years ago.
					
					 The fabrication of "north wind", racket for "eliminating forces following the north", insistence on defending "northern limit line" and other matters related with the north have been used as cards of deciding the results of each election. This features elections in south Korea.
					
					 Acts of abusing the south-north relations for security of power should never be allowed in the forthcoming election.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Chilling Atmosphere for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Chilling Atmosphere for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public an open letter on April 1 to denounce the U.S. for chilling the atmosphere for mending the north-south relations.
					 We are paying attention again to the U.S. attitude before and after the south-north high-level contact on Feb. 14, the letter said.
					
					 The U.S. fostered the atmosphere of a war through the north-targeted nuclear strike drill by introducing a formation of B-52s in the sky above Jik Islet in the West Sea of Korea at the time when the south and the north were reaching an agreement on reunion of separated families and relatives, it charged, adding this is a very open racket to foil south-north talks.
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. with the south Korean authorities deliberately tarnished the atmosphere of the hard-won reunion of separated families and relatives.
					
					 The U.S. irritated the north with extreme expression and deliberately escalated tensions on the Korean peninsula, throwing a wet blanket over the atmosphere of mending the south-north relations.
					
					 The military exercises kicked off by the U.S. after introducing nuclear submarine, Aegis destroyers and other huge nuclear war means in the East, West and South Seas of Korea go to clearly prove that the U.S. schemes to ignite a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. is threatening the existence of the south Korean people in order to meet its interests.
					
					 The real picture of the U.S. policy for foiling the improvement of south-north relations and its threat of a nuclear war has been proved objectively.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Its Desperate Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Its Desperate Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the UN Human Rights Council released a "report" of the "Commission of Inquiry on the human rights situations" in the DPRK and adopted a "human rights resolution" against it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday comments this as follows:
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean authorities joined in the fabrication of the conspiratorial document peppered with invectives and lies.
					
					 Such reckless behavior of the puppet authorities is a blatant challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and a politically-motivated provocation that can never be pardoned.
					
					 Unable to bring down the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue, the U.S. is becoming evermore draconic in the smear campaign against it over its human rights performance. The U.S. is working with bloodshot eyes to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK and realize its wild ambition to stifle it. It is none other than the south Korean authorities which have most zealously joined in the U.S. plot.
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea, obsessed with inveterate hostility and confrontational conception against compatriots in the north, have been more desperate than any other preceding regimes in their anti-DPRK "human rights" smear campaign, dancing to the tune of its U.S. master.
					
					 The puppet authorities, which leave their sovereignty to the mercy of outsiders, have neither qualification nor face to talk about the human rights. It is, indeed, a ridiculous political cartoon that the south Korean ruling forces are finding fault with the DPRK over its "human rights" performance.
					
					 The south Korean rulers should know well that their evermore desperate anti-DPRK "human rights" smear campaign will only bring shame and self-ruin to them.
					
					 They had better mind south Korea which has turned into a grave yard of human rights, not impudently accusing others.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Progressive Media Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Progressive Media Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee for Checking Moves to Close Newspaper Jaju Minbo in south Korea issued a statement on April 2 demanding a stop to suppression of progressive media.
					 The statement said that the Seoul City Authorities raised an administrative litigation against Jaju Minbo, accusing it for citing reports from the north as they are and refusing to criticize the north.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It is unjustifiable to charge the newspaper with violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that it reported objective facts.
					
					 Moreover, the authorities are taking issue with Jaju Minbo only though professors Han Ho Sok and Kim Sang Il and others have contributed a series of their articles to other media.
					
					 Terming it suppression targeting Jaju Minbo, the statement continued:
					
					 The Seoul City authorities should cancel its administrative litigation against Jaju Minbo which has worked to embody the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, the landmark in achieving independence, peace and reunification, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for its implementation, and opt for improving the inter-Koreans relations.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye "government" should stop at once its suppression of Jaju Minbo making efforts for the national reconciliation and cooperation under the uplifted banner of the independent reunification.
					
					 The all-people measure committee declares that it would turn out in the struggle for the freedom of expression and media together with conscientious media and human rights organizations.
					
					 The "government" and the Seoul City authorities should bear in mind that they would be condemned and punished by all Koreans and other progressives of the world if they turn away their face from the demand of the committee.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Hit for Its Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Hit for Its Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Saturday in a commentary condemns the Tokyo District Court for having recently decided the forcible sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) by orchestrating an unprecedented false burlesque.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are feigning ignorance of this, talking about the "judgment by the judicial organ" and the like in a bid to shirk the blame for it, but their poor excuse makes no sense.
					
					 It is none other than the Japanese authorities who manipulated the decision. It is the present chief executive who ordered the forcible sale by auction of the Korean Hall some years ago. In a nutshell, the current move for seizing the Korean Hall is not a "strict application of law" but the Japanese authorities' wanton abuse of law, and not a mere economical issue but a bragandish political outrage. It is the deep-rooted sinister aim of the Japanese reactionaries to dissolve the base of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and thus stamp out the movement of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The illegal decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall is a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave infringement on the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					 It amounts to a state-sponsored terrorist act that the Japanese reactionaries try to seize in a brigandish way the precious creatures of Koreans in Japan which assume the state character.
					
					 The DPRK will not remain a passive onlooker to the fact that its precious heritage and wealth are being seized in broad daylight.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities sincerely wish the improvement of the relations with the DPRK, they should ponder over the present situation in which the destiny of the relations may go bust, and stop at once their moves to seize the Korean Hall with the ulterior purpose.

articles.title: Anniversary of Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan Marked
 Tokyo, April 4 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting for marking the 20th anniversary of the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan was held in Tokyo on Mar. 28.
					 Present there were Jin Kil Sang, director of the Rights and Welfare Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), officials of the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan and such other centers across Japan and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Ri Ae Ho, director of the center, made a speech.
					
					 Ri said that the center has conducted the sacred work to preserve the national character and lineage of the Korean nation in the community of Koreans in Japan over the 20 years since it was set up on Mar. 23, 1994.
					
					 Referring to the importance of the national marriage in the community of Koreans in Japan, Ri expressed the will to further develop the work of such centers across Japan to meet the aspiration and demand of compatriots in the future.
					
					 Then a congratulatory message from the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs of the DPRK was read out.
					
					 Screened there was a video titled "20 year-long history of Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan".
					
					 A performance was given by Korean artistes on the same day.

articles.title: Russian Figure on His Impressions of the DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Figure on His Impressions of the DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Whenever I visit the DPRK I feel as if I entered my birthplace.
					 V.V. Grishkov, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said this during his recent visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 I was honored to meet the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and congratulate him on his 82nd birth anniversary when I visited the DPRK 20 years ago.
					
					 We make it a tradition to form the preparatory committee for celebrating his birth anniversary (Day of the Sun) and hold a photo exhibition, film show and other various events on his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The Korean people are all out in the dynamic drive to build a modern and highly civilized socialist country, true to the strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The People's Open-air Ice Rink, skate parks and other places we visited are the creatures newly built to make the people lead a happy life.
					
					 Okryu Children's Hospital and Ryugyong Dental Hospital installed with modern medical equipment are also splendid.
					
					 I was satisfied to see everything during my visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is building genuine socialism for the ideal and happiness of the people.
					
					 We are going to deeply study the precious historic experience gained by the WPK and apply it in our activities.
					
					 Our Maritime Territorial Regional Committee will fully support the WPK and make positive contributions to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the WPK.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the Korean people would register greater successes in socialist construction under the wise guidance of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who is firmly carrying forward the cause of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Bratislava on Mar. 31.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize various political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Celebrated in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Celebrated in Norway
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A Norwegian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed under the co-sponsorship of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, the Ostfold Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Friendship Society Norway-Korea on Mar. 27.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo exhibition and film show took place in Kyrgyzstan and Bangladesh on Mar. 21 and 24 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of the President.
					
					 The Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" was screened.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity "Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung founded for the first time in history the Juche idea that the popular masses are the masters of the revolution and construction and have the strength to propel them and led the Korean revolution to victory on its basis.
					
					 He was a tender-hearted father of the people as he showed warm love for them and dedicated himself to their happiness.
					
					 The Korean people significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun every year, highly praising him as the legendary hero, greatest man and invincible and iron-willed commander. This clearly shows once again how great his exploits are.
					
					 The Korean people are making miracles and innovations day by day in their efforts for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard, rallied single-mindedly around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding leader and peerlessly elder statesman who founded the Juche idea and performed the undying exploits for the era and humankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- There took place lectures in Tajikistan and Malaysia and round-table talks in Ethiopia from Mar. 25 to 28 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, member of the Presidium of the C.C., the Communist Party of Tajikistan, praised the President as the sun of Juche who illuminated the road to be followed by humankind, adding:
					
					 The President beat down the Japanese imperialists and achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 He led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and built a socialist power centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					 He made public lots of famous works through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and instilled conviction of certain victory into the world progressive people in their drive to realize the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 His exploits will always go down as the sun shines forever. 
					
					 Chong Chingchi, manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia, said in a lecture:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il whom the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in the history spanning five thousand years were not only the leaders of a country but peerless patriots and tender-hearted fathers of the people.
					
					 Their exploits are shining brighter, thanks to HE Kim Jong Un who has the same outlook on the motherland, people and revolution as they had.
					
					 The speakers at the round-table talks held in Ethiopia praised Kim Il Sung for sending selfless aid to the African people's struggle for national liberation and economic development.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Supports DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Supports DPRK's Stand
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- An article titled "To mend the inter-Korean relations is the requirement of the times" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on March 25. 
					 The Korean nation, a homogeneous nation with the history spanning 5 000 years, is suffering pains resulting from their separation for nearly seven decades due to the U.S., the article said, and went on:
					
					 Even now a vicious cycle of slandering and confrontation is going on in the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The Korean nation suffers heavily owing to the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and this also brings big damage to the peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 Putting an end to the history of north-south confrontation is essential to remove the danger of a war hanging over the Korean nation and turn this region, the one of the biggest hotspots in the world, into a permanent peace zone. 
					
					 This is the requirement of not only the Korean nation but also the world peace-loving people.
					
					 If Korea is reunified, it will be more prosperous in all sectors politically and militarily, economically and culturally. 
					
					 When the north-south relations are mended, a wide avenue will be opened for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and achieving unified development and common prosperity of the nation. 
					
					 It is quite possible if one has the firm will to remove the past distrust and put an end to the history of confrontation from the stand of By the Korean Nation Itself. 
					
					 The north-south relations cannot be mended by the efforts of one side only. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make a decision, not turning its back on the genuine and patriotic will of the DPRK. 
					
					 The international community hopes that the north-south relations in Korea will be mended as early as possible.

articles.title: Italian Political Figure Expresses Solidarity with DPRK
articles.content:
Italian Political Figure Expresses Solidarity with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Solidarity with DPRK" was posted by Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, on its website on March 30. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are interfering in internal affairs of those countries and nations which do not yield to them everywhere in the world. 
					
					 They are committing hostile acts and provocations against the DPRK, labeling the clear proposals made by the DPRK to defuse acute tensions on the Korean peninsula as false propaganda. 
					
					 In this regard we recollect that the DPRK made a proposal urging the south Korean authorities to stop the joint military drills kicked off by them in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. turned down without any explanation the crucial proposals made by the DPRK to defuse tensions and mend the inter-Korean relations as the former did as regards the latter's proposals for making the criminal blockade to arrest its development lifted. 
					
					 As regards the U.S. hostile acts getting evermore serious, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on March 14 declared at home and abroad its principled stand on the U.S. hostile policy toward it. 
					
					 The article introduced in detail the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, urging the U.S. to clearly judge the reality and make a policy decision as required by the present times.

articles.title: Japan Denounced for Its Fascist Rowdyism against Chongryon
articles.content:
Japan Denounced for Its Fascist Rowdyism against Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public a joint statement titled "The Japanese authorities, stop at once the dastardly racket to illegally sell the Korean Hall of Chongryon" on March 31.
					 The statement condemned the Japanese authorities for instigating the Tokyo District Court to make a decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 24.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It is a part of their policy to stamp out Chongryon at any cost, regarding it like a thorn in their flesh for a long period.
					
					 Historically, the Japanese authorities have intensified their moves to impose sanctions against the DPRK and stifle it and resorted to political suppression and national persecution against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan after setting the hostile policy towards the DPRK as a state policy.
					
					 It is a due state obligation and unavoidable legal and moral responsibility of the Japanese authorities to ensure the rights of the direct victims to the criminal and forcible drafting of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and the Koreans in Japan, their descendants, and to protect their properties.
					
					 The issue related to the Korean Hall would not have presented itself if the Japanese authorities did not resort to the fascist moves to stamp out Chongryon politically and financially but fulfilled their moral and legal obligation.
					
					 The Japanese government should discontinue the fascist rowdyism against Chongryon and make an apology for it.
					
					 The moves to sell the Korean Hall are not only the violence to Koreans in Japan but also an act of antagonizing all Koreans.
					
					 The Japanese government should halt its reckless moves at once and admit and repent of its criminal acts before the world.
					
					 The Korean nation will closely watch how Japan in the court of the history behaves.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign media praised the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung with the approach of his birth anniversary (Day of the Sun). 
					 The Bangladeshi paper Weekly Industry on March 23 said:
					
					 Under the leadership of the President the Korean people fully displayed the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance during the 15 year-long arduous armed struggle to liberate the country. 
					
					 During the Korean War to beat back the U.S. imperialists' aggression the President led the service personnel of the Korean People's Army to defeat the aggressors with the unique war methods including the tunnel warfare and win victory. 
					
					 After the war he put forward the original line for economic construction on giving priority to the growth of heavy industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture so that the Korean people might advance along the road of independence. 
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on March 25 carried an article. It said:
					
					 The President worked heart and soul to accomplish the cause of global independence all his life. 
					
					 He sincerely helped the cause of independence against imperialism in other countries. 
					
					 The banner of independence held high by him even now serves as the great motive power instilling great strength and courage into progressive mankind. 
					
					 The State Radio and the "F.M. 90. 5" Radio of Cambodia on March 28 introduced the glorious revolutionary life and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung, saying that the world public are recollecting with deep emotion his personality as a great man on the occasion of Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Vocero de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC revela anuncio muy tarde de prueba de misiles de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Vocero de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC revela anuncio muy tarde de prueba de misiles de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos hicieron el 23 de marzo en el campo de tiros Anhung de Thae-an de la provincia de Chungchong del Sur el no oficial ensayo de lanzamiento de misiles balisticos y lo dieron a la publicidad a mas de 10 dias desde aquel dia.
					En la actualidad, las prensas surcoreanas anuncian tanto que salio exitosa la prueba del lanzamiento de misil balistico con el alcance de 500km, desarrollado con la tecnologia foranea.
					
					Ademas hablan tanto de que toda la extension de la RPDC excepto la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte podra ser puesta en la esfera de golpe si tales misiles se incorporen en combate el proximo ano.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea dio el dia 5 la siguiente respuesta al reportero del Periodico Joson Inmingun:
					
					Es ridiculo el hecho de que los titeres surcoreanos dicen como si hubieran hecho una gran cosa con el lanzamiento de misiles con el alcance de 500km y de que hayan publicado hoy la prueba de lanzamiento de tal misil que estaba en oculto hasta la fecha.
					
					Como trascendidos, las unidades de fuego de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC realizaron desde la segunda quincena de febrero hasta finales de marzo el normal entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes.
					
					Entonces, los titeres surcoreanos armaron campana junto con su amo gringo como si nuestros cohetes hubieran caido en el centro de Seul.
					
					Se desesperaron a aplicar otra nueva "sancion" a la RPDC calificando ese lanzamiento de "violacion de resolucion de la ONU" y "provocacion".
					
					En estos dias, resuenan sin parar en suelo surcoreano las voces de censura sobre la miserable reaccion militar de los titeres sobre el normal entrenamiento de disparo maritimo de artilleria de nuestro ejercito.
					
					Ademas de eso, ocurrio el caso de drones, lo cual degrado mas la honra de los titeres que se hallaban en aprieto.
					
					A las autoridades titeres, que estan en un lio por tal disparo maritimo de artilleria ejecutado en zona maritima candente del frente suroeste y el caso de drones, les necesitaba un remedio para salvar la situacion.
					
					Por eso, ellas trataron de mitigar la censura y la burla crecientes describiendo como un "gran exito" la prueba de lanzamiento de misiles realizada a puertas cerradas.
					
					Pero, no pudieron liberarse de su situacion miserable sino sufrieron la verguenza.
					
					Los hombres estan ansiosos de saber como reaccionaria EE.UU. sobre la publicacion de lanzamiento de misiles de los titeres surcoreanos porque la posicion del imperio norteamericano sobre nuestro entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes y el otro de ensayo de misiles de los titeres, realizados en la Peninsula Coreana, ayudara a evaluar otra vez la pauta y el modo de accion a estilo norteamericano.
					
					Aunque tengan 10 bocas, los titeres surcoreanos no podran cuestionar el ejercicio de derecho a autodefensa de la RPDC como el lanzamiento justo de cohetes.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben darse clara cuenta de que su posicion va siendo mas miserable por su campana de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Tambien el imperio norteamericano no debera hablar atrevidamente de las medidas de la RPDC que toma para fortalecer el disuasivo autodefensivo.

articles.title: Hundido barco de nacionalidad mongolesa con tripulantes coreanos
articles.content:
Hundido barco de nacionalidad mongolesa con tripulantes coreanos
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- A la madrugada de ayer, en plena travesia con destino a Shanghai de China, fue hundido en las aguas maritimas cercanas a la isla Jeju el carguero comercial de nacionalidad mongolesa Grand Fortune 1 que tiene a bordo a los tripulantes de la compania de navios Kunhae, perteneciente a la Direccion Estatal de Control de Asuntos Maritimos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Estan investigando ahora la causa del accidente.
					
					Entre 16 tripulantes coreanos, murieron 2, se salvaron 3 y fueron desaparecidos 11.
					
					La RPDC desea que las partes relacionadas realicen las labores de rescate y cooperen para facilitar el regreso pronto a sus familiares de los tripulantes sobrevivientes desde el punto de vista humanitario y conforme a las costumbres internacionales.

articles.title: Efectuado mitin de militares del EPC para jurar la venganza
articles.content:
Efectuado mitin de militares del EPC para jurar la venganza
Kangryong, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Empresa de Cultivos Maritimos de Pupho, desde donde se ve muy cerca la isla surcoreana Yonphyong, el mitin de los uniformados del Ejercito Popular de Corea para no perdonar nunca las barbaridades cometidas por los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana contra los tripulantes de la RPDC y cobrar sin falta su precio.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los comandantes, oficiales y militares de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					Accedieron al microfono el tripulante Kim Thae Won y el maquinista responsable Kim Chol de la Empresa Pesquera de Ongjin y los uniformados del EPC, Jang Hyok y Sim Kang Ju.
					
					Ellos senalaron que causan vehemente indignacion de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC los actos barbaros de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos que secuestraron el 27 de marzo un barco pesquero pacifico al incursionar en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC y agredieron fisicamente a sus tripulantes.
					
					Prosiguieron que los tripulantes secuestrados pudieron resistir hasta el final y volver a la patria porque pensaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un les defiende.
					
					Si se da la orden del Comandante Supremo, abriremos el fuego de venganza implacable para envolver en llamas el nido de los enemigos como el incidente de la isla Yonphyong, expresaron.
					
					No se puede perdonar jamas las barbaridades de los titeres surcoreanos cometidas bajo el cielo azul de la patria, apuntaron.
					
					  Los enemigos, que trataron de separar a nuestros habitantes del regazo del Comandante Supremo, tendran que pagarlo con cadaveres y muertos, aseveraron.
					
					  En la ocasion fueron publicadas las obras literarias que denuncian la invariable ambicion y las vejaciones medievales de la banda de traidores surcoreanos.
					
					  Acto seguido, fue leida la nota de juramento de venganza.

articles.title: Celebran acto del "Dia del Cielo" por 154o aniversario de Chondoismo
articles.content:
Celebran acto del "Dia del Cielo" por 154o aniversario de Chondoismo
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en esta capital el acto del "Dia del Cielo" por el 154o aniversario de la fundacion de Chondoismo (religion coreana).
					Al acto asistieron el vicepresidente Yun Jong Ho y otros funcionarios del Comite de Direccion Central de la Asociacion de Chondoistas de Corea y los chondoistas en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Yun dijo que en los tiempos pasados, los chondoistas se esforzaron mucho dedicando sangre y sudor por realizar los ideales patrioticos, tales como la "salvacion al pueblo", la  "proteccion del pais y la tranquilidad del pueblo", el "rechazamiento a la invasion de los europeos y los japoneses" y la "construccion del paraiso terrestre".
					
					En particular, hizo enfasis en que recientemente, la RPDC tomo varias medidas partiendo del noble deseo de poner punto final a la historia de division territorial y nacional y abrir el ancho camino de mejora de relaciones intercoreanas con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales.
					
					Sin embargo, despreciando la magnanimidad y buena fe de la RPDC, Estados Unidos y las fuerzas hostiles recrudecen su campana para asfixiarla politicamente, aislarla economicamente y aplastarla militarmente y debido a esto, se torna muy grave la situacion del pais, lamento.
					
					Exhorto a todos los chondoistas del Norte y el Sur a abrir la nueva fase de reunificacion independiente, paz y prosperidad al movilizarse en la lucha pannacional por rechazar a las fuerzas foraneas, defender la seguridad y la paz de la nacion y crear el ambiente favorable a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					El acto se realizo segun la ritualidad chondoista.
